LanguageData.Axi_SMG_Scorpion_21CA.label: CZ Scorpion
LanguageData.Axi_SMG_Scorpion_21CA.description: The third generation Scorpion, the EVO 3, continues CZ's tradition of taking everything great about the previous generation Scorpion and improving upon it. The EVO 3 is a distilled masterpiece of a 9mm SMG, boasting a fast fire rate, soft recoil impulse, and excellent ergonomics. It's no wonder special operations and boarding forces around the cluster rave about this compact buzzsaw of a gun.
LanguageData.Axi_SMG_Scorpion_21CA.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Axi_SMG_Scorpion_21CA.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Scorpion_21CA.label: Scorpion EVO bullet
